<title level="1" right="Trait">[Scroll](/Traits.aspx?ID=140)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A scroll contains a single spell you can cast without a spell slot.
name: Scroll
